attributes.action: Give Wales and England the same amount of IVF cycles through IVF!!!!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have decided to start this petition on behalf of ALL women and men in Wales who have been UNFAIRLY discriminated against because we simply live in Wales!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!England are allowed 3 attempts at IVF through the NHS and Wales are allowed 1!This I feel, as well as many other women in this situation totally unfair, discriminatory and so very, very upsetting!I would like to ask that you reconsider the way in which IVF is funded so that both people in England and Wales have a fair and equal chance/try at IVF.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Welsh Assembly.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
